trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a particular type of property from a drop-down box within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de um determinado tipo de propriedade de uma caixa suspensa dentro de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Usually, the text specified by <xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.Text%2A> is displayed on the drop-down box from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> as a link or button.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o texto especificado pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.Text%2A>é exibido na caixa de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>como um link ou botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> </xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: When clicked, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.CreateInstance%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.Type> of the object to create.
trans-unit.target: Quando clicado, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.CreateInstance%2A>método for chamado com o <xref:System.Type>do objeto a ser criado.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InstanceCreationEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna uma instância do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do tipo especificado ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
